algorithm_technique: Convert times to minutes, handle day rollover, and calculate full 15-minute intervals.
Convert times to minutes, adjust logout time if earlier, and calculate interval difference.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate how many full 15-minute rounds are played between login and logout times.
problem_summary_technical: Converts times to minutes, handles day rollovers, and uses integer division to count 15-minute intervals.
key_insights: Representing time in minutes simplifies calculations.
Handling the case where logout time is on the next day is crucial.
The number of full rounds is the difference between the number of rounds started by logout and the number of rounds started by login.
Adjusting logout minutes and hours simplifies the day rollover logic.
The formula `(start + 15 - 1) // 15` correctly finds the first round start time that is fully contained.
The formula `finish // 15` finds the last round start time that is fully contained.
